content: this delightfully cozy baby blanket is such a joy to knit featuring a playful chevron design in three fresh shades of west wool tandem it brings a modern touch to any nursery the simple easy-to-memorize stitch pattern makes it perfect for beginners allowing you to relax and knit without constantly checking the instructions named after my mother who taught me to crochet and knit keating is the kind of knitting project that looks impressive but is wonderfully simple to create **finished measurements ** 41 8 inch / 106 cm length 35 5 inch / 90 cm width **yarn ** dk **yardage ** approximately 1500 yds / 1370m total a 500 yds / 458 m b 500 yds / 458 m c 500 yds / 458 m **shown in ** tandem 100% merino 254yds / 233m per 100g skein color a flamingo color b sand color c pickle juice **needles ** us 7 / 4 5mm circular in 32 / 80cm length or size needed to obtain gauge you may elect to use long straight needles if you prefer always choose a needle size and yarn combination that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **notions ** 1 stitch marker tapestry needle **gauge ** 20 sts x 39 row = 4 /10 cm in garter stitch blocked
